website_summaries.verdict: A tough swing set with fun features and craftsmanship that's likely to last through childhood and beyond.
pros: Crafted in a durable alloy steel that's designed to last
Kids love the 9-foot slide that complements three swings, monkey bars, fireman's pole, and trapeze bar
cons: Takes a little time to assemble
Some issues with the hardware noted
Not suitable for smaller kids, as some of the pieces are fairly high off the ground

customer_reviews.title: Rust , Rust and more Rust
customer_reviews.text: RUST, all over very poor powder coating coverage , warrenty does not cover rust pic are just over a year old.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Have had it up for about 2 months now. Only took hubby 2 hrs to build by himself (organized all parts first). It's very sturdy. Our 8 year old loves it. She's a bit small for the monkey bars but she can easily play on everything else. Love that I won't have to paint it. Another reviewer suggested putting clear caulking aroun the base of legs where they pop into a plastic cap. We also did that to prevent water getting into the metal legs. Definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: CA mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and warranty
customer_reviews.text: We bought this swing set 4 1/2 years ago and still love it. I wanted to write this review to let people know how awesome lifetime customer service is. We had some rust on a piece and decided to see if we could get a new piece with lifetime warranty. Sent in a photo and no questions asked, they sent us a new piece right away. So easy. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for two years now. It has been such a joy to have. Simple enough to put together but you will need at least two people and maybe a step ladder. It has held up so well for the past two years, especially considering we are in Las Vegas and it is hit hard with the sun and wind. The only thing is that you need to go around and tighten all the bolts occasionally. This is just a side effect of something that moves back and forth all the time. We have 4 pretty big kids and they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F

customer_reviews.title: Pick this one!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly love this thing I'm 5'7" and 200lbs and it doesnt even shake when I swing or slide. Im a mother of a larger child and this works for him and all the kids/teens in my life. We have had 4 swingsets one was like this one but a different brand but this one is better. For us it was pricey but well worth it. I believe it will last for years and years! The grips on the swings are heavy duty so littles cant bite through it. Only thing i didnt like is how close the swings are but it doesnt matter much for us. Took me about 4 hours by myself to set this up. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Playset for our Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: It's everything the ad said and more. Very sturdy ... even my adult kids were on it. Grandkids age 1 to 9 were on it constantly. Very sturdy. We were in the heat of the day and the metal and slide were warm, but never hot. Easy to interchange the strap swings for a child swing or glider which we already had. Wife and I assembled in 2 hours. They love the bars, pole, etc. It's much larger than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rahm

customer_reviews.title: Smart design, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swing set. Smart design, solid construction. Took 4 hours for my wife and I to set up (see video).
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing investment!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best investments we've made for our kids. It keeps all the kids happy, outside (away from video games) and they're not complaining they're bored! Its also great when our nephews come over and for get togethers! Keeps all the kids entertained, ages 2-17!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent swingset
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I got a metal swing set after looking at all of the wooden ones. It only took 5 hours for my husband to assemble by himself, so much easier than a wooden one! From what I read the wooden ones take several days to assemble and the wood can split when you tighten screws. This is also a heavier swing set and more wind resistant than wooden ones. My neighbor's wooden swingset has been blown over, but this one will definitely stay in place, it has anchors. I also attached a baby swing with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 8 y/o and he LOVES it! My husband found it easy to assembly alone in just a few hours (full disclosure, he is a commercial electrician and retired military, so he's pretty strong and handy). He dug out around the posts to level it for now and we hired a landscaper to come dig out the grass, place a border, and put down rubber mulch for extra safety. Husband has an almost 3 y/o grandson who doesn't seem to enjoy it much yet, but I know it will hold up for many years to come when he's bigger. We've already had grow ups use the swings and it seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: HM1SCW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, kid pleaser
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been playing with this for a while. The 2 four year olds and the big 8 year old can all swing at the same time and it doesn't budge, even without anchors. I'm 5"7' and 160lbs, and I can swing on it and hang from the monkey bars. It's tall enough to "swing big" and the older ones enjoys it still. Have had almost 8 months, and no sign of wear/tear or rust, which is more than I can say for the last swing set we had. Great product, worth the extra money to have the durability!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I had someone else install it and I am glad I did. We also cemented it in as we have a young boy and his friends over. It took three people to assemble, mostly due to the weight. The set is unique for a residential set and appears to be very strong. The only thing I am concerned about is when the children swing, there is some give to the main top bar that holds the swings and trapeze. If the "give" I'm talking about is part of the design that makes it stronger, then it would be nice if the manufacturer informed the customer of this. Time will tell, but it appears to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Sypek D'Amato

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid Swingset
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid swing set. Ensure that everything is level or you could run into some difficulty putting it up. This is the second Lifetime swing set we have purchased. The instructions are always very easy to follow and the parts are always packaged in the box nicely. A bonus is the hardware is broken down by steps and separated in the package so you know you are using the right pieces. Lifetime customer support is always top notch if you run into any warranty issues. Would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: vmipolevaulter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to spend a thousand bucks on a swing set. I had it in my cart for years going back and forth on it, but with 3 young boys I finally decided it was worth it and it is. Very sturdy, very high quality and very nice looking. Not a bad thing to say about it. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rpmnoel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe what you read...
customer_reviews.text: The swing set is high quality. The company though I would RUN FROM. The add stated white glove delivery service; meaning delivery to my backyard and TWO people would be there to haul away trash. ONE man showed up and stated he’d only deliver to curb side or driveway. SET: nice; COMPANY: NOT HONEST
customer_reviews.author: Dave’s not home

customer_reviews.title: Good swing. Some parts get hot. Stairs are slippery
customer_reviews.text: Great swing set. No rusting even after a week long of rain and higher temps. Instructions were surprisingly easy to follow. The hardware is divided into sections and all pieces were there. I would recommend at least two people to assemble. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is all the green metal gets really hot. The brown metal has a coating that is heat resistant and are only warm in direct sunlight. Another consideration is the steps on the ladder are slippery, especially if any water is involved. (Morning dew, fog, ect.) I plan on adding some grip of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and it was fairly painless to build. Me and my Wife built it in less than 8hrs. It went together with no complications. It's sturdy construction and once anchored sits solid even with 2 adults swinging and the kids playing/swinging at the same time. I have no doubts it will be fun for years to come. I just wish they were a little more economical/budget friendly. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grands are going to LOVE this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, attractive swingset. It came impressively well packaged with excellent directions. I am a 125# 60 y/o woman and had no difficulty assembling this swingset. I did require help lifting the monkey bar section to an upright position. I did not use the slide, it will be repurposed at our son's home as an addition to the tree house he built for the grands. I put this together over the course of two days, I took my time and enjoyed the process.
customer_reviews.author: ELD

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for getting the kids outside playing!
customer_reviews.text: So in love with this swing set. It was purchased with our middle child in mind because of the monkey bars. All three children love it! We’ve watched them (9,6, and 5) ditch the tablets so they can play on their swing set. It’s so sturdy! It has a fireman pole too that I did not see when I bought it so the extra surprise was a great extra!
customer_reviews.author: StacySmo

customer_reviews.title: Great Swingset!
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome swingset. We live in the Pacific Northwest, so having it coated was very important. I was initially looking for a smaller set for our grandkids ages 8 months to 6 years. However, I decided to get a nicer larger one so the kids as they grow can use it. Plus, I just inherited two more grand kids via a new relationship and have a nephew that will get lots of fun with this set. It is extremely well built. Three adults were able to install it in a little over 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie scheuffele

customer_reviews.title: Best Play Set out there
customer_reviews.text: Excellent package! We have a small farm tractor with a forklift that we used to unload it from the truck & move it near where we wanted to assemble it. Son & I, an old lady, put it together in about 2hrs. He is very mechanical, I all I did was hold things in place when balancing legs during assembly. Very pleased with it's sturdiness & the grandkids love it! So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MrsC5

customer_reviews.title: Easiest play set I ever built!
customer_reviews.text: Really well built and packaged. Parts were organized in easy to follow instructions. The larger pieces came in two large boxes while the parts and swings were in a smaller box. We had one of those wooden play sets at our old house that needed eight people and 16 hours to complete. Other than needing a third person to help move the finished set in place, I spent a few hours on a Saturday getting things mostly together and then finished things up over a few hours the next day with my wife. I’m not a handy person, but managed this with ease. And most important, my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: I bored out the plastic holes so the bolts could go ...
customer_reviews.text: would have given it 5 stars, but 3 of the poles were bent at the ends, it did not happen during transit, we used a large wrench to straighten it. also I had an issue with the plastic caps at the top.. rather than fight it, I bored out the plastic holes so the bolts could go through.. kids love it, I love it, yes I would recommend you buy this, My son and I are pretty mechanically inclined, so even with the issues it took us less than 2 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Callahan

customer_reviews.title: relatively easy to put together, great quality
customer_reviews.text: it does take a couple of people to put this together - doing it yourself would be difficult. My only complaint about assembly was that the instructions require you to drill holes in the plastic ledge and slide. I don't understand why they couldn't have premanufactured it with holes already in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Sackrider II

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was very easy. Directions were clear
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I purchased this product for our 2 yr old son. Assembly was very easy. Directions were clear. Took about 5-6 hrs overall. No need to anchor in ground. This swing set is heavy duty. Like one you would find in a public park. The quality over exceeded our expectations. This product will last forever. He loves it. I am very happy with this purchase. Glad i choose this one instead of a wooden set. I recommend this product to anyone & everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: I agree with past reviewers re: what appears to be a substantive and attractive play set. It is designed for older kids though I've ordered a bucket seat (extra accessory) for a toddler. Looks like it is safe, sturdy and kids can grow into it. While I was delighted it came well in advance of delivery date, with a days notice, I had to scramble to be available to receive it and to reschedule assembly. Disappointed that it was missing 4 large bolts; which I purchased at wellstocked hardware store but inconvenienced assemblers. At the price, would expect all parts and maybe some extras! Thus 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gita Schonfeld

customer_reviews.title: Quality swing set, but HORRIBLE hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Quality swing set, but horrible hardware. 3 of the bolts snapped in half during assembly, and it wasnt due to over torquing them or cross-threading. Also, several of the bolts heads stripped the hex head making the supplied allen wrench slip and spin freely in the bolt head. Again, quality swing set. But the hardware is absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: DanFan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. (3hrs) A single piece was missing in the shipment, 1 phone call to LIFETIME and they had one on the way. It's hard to complain about this product when its made this well and costs this little. I couldn't build it myself for this price.
customer_reviews.author: starvoice

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't too bad to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too bad to assemble. Nice and big. As an adult I feel comfortable swinging on it. I wish the hooks to the swing were a little further apart. I have a Lifetime gemodome that I purchased a few years ago. One of the bars is starting to rust. I contacted Lifetime and even though it's past the warranty they offered to ship me out two cans of paint at no charge. I received the package in just days. Amazing customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: MD P.

customer_reviews.title: Two adults assembled this in about 2 hours and 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Two adults assembled this in about 2 hours and 15 minutes. Would have been quicker, but we had to scrounge for some replacement hardware after two of the supplied bolts snapped while tightening. The supplied hardware is in grades, should be at least grade 2, for what the swing set cost should be grade 5. End result, grandkids enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Seriously sturdy swingset!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment. My kids love it, and I love having something to keep them active and having fun in my yard. The quality is impressive. My husband and sons put it together in just a few hours, and everything you need is included. You do not need to buy anchors, they come with the set. Thanks for another great product, Lifetime!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This swingset is superior to anything else out there
customer_reviews.text: This swingset is superior to anything else out there. Absolutely perfect for my precious little grandson. It is safe and fun and should last for generations. It can handle an adult swinging full power with no movement/shifting of the structure whatsoever and no anchoring needed. My husband and son put it up while I was at church!!! FIVE STARS AND TWO THUMBS UP!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaLee

customer_reviews.title: Great swingset for growing with kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing set! We have baby swings instead of 2 of the regular swings for our 1 and 2 year olds. I can swing in between them just great. We don't have it anchored to the ground, so if my 230 lb husband swings it does shift slightly. My 130 lbs plus the kids won't move it though. We've had it 6 months in all weather and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, fun to play on.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nice looking piece of equipment. Easy to install. Need about 3 people to set up certain portions-just the main frame-- otherwise the other parts can be done by 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: ReishaNavya

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put the set together in two days. 8 to 10 hours total work time. Very safe and fun. If you want your own playground, this is it. We tried putting together a wood one and the pieces did not match up. We ended up returning it and buying this. They ended up being the same price! GREAT BUY. We've had it for a month and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Armani Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Ours gets used quite often. However, it would be best to secure to the ground. Instructions say its not necessary but ours has tipped when all the kids get on one side. Quality is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AASR

customer_reviews.title: Holds up really well
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing addition to the yard for the kiddos and aside from the creaking noise when they swing it is incredibly sturdy and oddly cool under the Florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Rates more than 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy setup for 2 or more people. Superb customer service. Piece missing from package. Emailed them. They ship replacement part. No hassles. The grand kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: ot401

customer_reviews.title: Fun building product with simple and clear directions
customer_reviews.text: One person can put together. Two is ideal for putting the monkey bars together. Fun building product with simple and clear directions. All pieces needed and labeled for ease of use. I am a mom who put 95% of this together by myself and my 10 yo helped with the last 5% aligning the monkey bars up. Product is sturdy and appears that years of use will be gained from this purchase and most of all, my daughters 10 and 5 love to play on this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Swing set
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing set. It was a hard decision whether to buy this set or a wooden set. This set is maintenance free !! It was easy to assemble. Two men about 3 hours. All the parts were included and the directions were easy to follow. I read a review before that said the hardware was poor and they had to purchase new, I did not find this to be true. The set is the hit of the neighborhood...and a one of a kind. My grandchildren that are 6 and 8 like it very much but the 2 year old can not get onto the slide because of the design of it. That is the only down fall.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It's a top notch set that they can enjoy now and grow into
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research I decided on purchasing this one for my kids (5 and 2). It's a top notch set that they can enjoy now and grow into. It's sturdy and excellent quality. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: McYa

customer_reviews.title: Best swing set ever!
customer_reviews.text: We definitely balked at the price at first ....but you get what you pay for. It took a while to ship but shipped with a crate built specifically for the 2 boxes and slide....not a scratch on it. My kids love,love, love this set. It is a solid metal swing set. Three kids ages 5,7,9 can swing at once, no problem ...even though the set is not anchored in the ground. Nothing to maintain here! Well worth every penny, not disappointed. Looks like something you would find on a school playground.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Great swing set, pretty easy to set up. I would give it 5 stars but the ladder going up to the slide is difficult for smaller children to climb up. Our 7 yr old can use everything without any assistance. Our two younger kids need help getting up to slide, using the monkey bars and trapeze bar.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyMan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swingset
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! My father and I put this together in about 4.5 hours. Instructions were very clear. Kids ages 7-11 love it!! My 3 month old will grow into it so it's good for kids if all ages. Only concern is that the 3 swings are close to one another and I can foresee collisions (probably intentional from my boys) in our future.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. McGoff

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, high quality swing set
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this swing set based on reviews and to replace a flimsy wooden set that only lasted a few weeks. This is definitely worth the price! Very sturdy and easy to assent compared to the wooden sets- 3 hours vs days. However, the main carrier for this set does not deliver to Wyoming so we had to call numerous times to have them send it via a different carrier to our location. We did receive a small refund for the 3 week delay which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: brownie29

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product so far
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product so far, my daughter got this for her 8th birthday and loves it. If you are looking to purchase, my only comment would be, that this playset is probably not as heavy duty as it looks or may be expected. I will probably be concerned come hurricane season this year. Really hoping the anchors sold by the Lifetime company work with this set!
customer_reviews.author: snerica

customer_reviews.title: Longevity and resale ability when the kids get older
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 children. 11, 6, 5. The material is great and i dont forsee splinters. Assembly wasnt bad and the instructions were easy. We use it to do pullups on all the time. Me at 170 and my wife at 140. We both swing on it too. We got the geo dome too and that thing is excellent too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Large
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, need two people. And it's kinda easy to move once put together, I had to move it about a foot because once put together it was too close to a gate. Son loves it and his friends all want to play on it when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica cherry

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grand kids to use. Came with fantastic instructors and mostly easy to put together. The set is extremely sturdy and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic swing set!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids, ages 4 and 9, have been on this swing set every day since it was installed! They love it! It's the perfect size for both of them, and even Mom and Dad can swing for a bit. After reading all of the other reviews, we decided on this one and I'm glad we did. It's strong, durable and the earth tone colors blend nicely with the outdoors. It's considerably bigger that our older, more traditional swing set. We also chose to add installation to our order (the two young fellows had it put together in two and a half hours...great service!) Amazon made everything from ordering, delivery and installation a breeze. We're very, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CERmom

customer_reviews.title: Instant success . . . . .
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered. All parts were present and clearly identified in the instruction. Assembled in less than three hours with son in law. Hardest part was breaking down the shipping crate for disposal . . . ; ) I was pleasantly surprised in the stability even with the three swings in use. Grand kids love it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: dklj

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy set! It's good for ages 7 through adult. Took 1 person with occasional help, about 3 hours to assemble. My kids love it! I have a small yard and this works perfect in it!
customer_reviews.author: singlemom

customer_reviews.title: Quality built USA
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to assemble. Everything was bagged and tagged correctly. Nothing was missing and directions extremely easy to follow. If you need to move it it would be easily done because of the way it’s built. Excellent quality! Very pleased. Grandson approved!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great set.  Easy assembly. Sturdy & high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Sturdy and easy to put together. My son and I put it up in 2.5 hours on level lawn. Do yourself a favor and plan it out. Look at all the pieces and figure out how the sections (monkey bar, swings and slide) connect and how you want to orient in the space. No need for anchors so far, even with 3 ten year olds swinging (although one leg does wiggle if all 3 swings are in sync). Took another hour to put down the mulch (highly recommend for safety) and edging. Half a day later we are very happy. Have had it up since early April 2015 and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: mlaphd

customer_reviews.title: Made my life fun.
customer_reviews.text: I admit that this is one of my best purchase that worths every penny I paid. I'm so glad for purchasing this product during pandamic.
customer_reviews.author: NOOR

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids having a ball!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids were always wanting to go to the park so I decided to purchase this activity center for them and it's getting a workout! They love all the features and considering how well it's constructed, should last many years. My son tells me they're on it and getting their exercise every day. New friends are sure to made by invitations to play!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our second lifetime swing. Left the other one behind when we sold the house. This one is just as solid and has a lot of different activities for the kids. I was worried that it might be to small for my 7 yr old son and it’s perfect even for the 9 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Boone

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: We bought this awesome set play set in 2016! No rust no wear! It has been the best investment for our family! I’m even able to swing and slide😉
customer_reviews.author: Lesams

customer_reviews.title: Much more sturdy than most metal swingset
customer_reviews.text: Took us a little over 4 hours to assemble (1 adult, one 12 year old and about an hour of help from another adult with lifting heavy peices). Much more sturdy than most metal swingset. Kids are loving it. Rated only a 4 because a bolt was missing and one of the nuts wasn't threaded, so had to purchase separately at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Flutterbuys

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: The shipment came a week early and was crated very well. No damage and packaged very good. All parts were in the boxes and very well labeled. Easy to assemble with just a few tools. Took me and my wife about 2 hours to assemble. Best experience I have had with the freight court company and manufacturer. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love it just as much as the kids
customer_reviews.text: I love it just as much as the kids! This is a well made and solid swing set and I'm so impressed with it. The seats are comfortable on the swings, even for me and I'm a big person! My grandkids loved the baby swing I attached and they fell asleep while swinging! This is the best swing set I've ever seen and the makers of it built it with care! You will not be disappointed if you buy this high quality and nice looking swing set!
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Rohrbach

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great swing set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great swing set. Our children enjoy it alot. It is very sturdy and easy to put together. It did have one hole that wasn't drilled, but we knew that due to another customer review. Not a big deal. It should last a long time. We really researched before we bought and although wood is cheaper, even the safer option of cedar, I liked how this is painted to keep cool and no risk of splinters in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Applebyacres

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Yet!!
customer_reviews.text: My rough and tumble almost 2 year old LOVES this set! We bought a toddler bucket seat as it did not come with one. Quality product,only had to drill out one hole to make it bigger. would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Cookin' for fun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! This is awesome. I didn't have to paint or stain it and I can take a pressure washer to it to clean it. With all of the spiders and wild animals out here in the Florida country, I wanted something open and inhospitable to creatures. This is perfect! The one thing we added was Non-Skid tape to the rungs of the ladders. They were VERY slick when wet which is to be expected with painted metal surfaces. This is not a product defect, just something we added for safety.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Kane

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed, glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this play set! Packaging was great, and shipping was fast. Even the hardware (bolts, screws, etc.) were packages separately, to coincide the instruction manual. It is very heavy duty, and comes with a large stake to stake down the firemen's pole, and 2 anchors that run through the end of the swing set, to further anchor the play set down. My kids love this!!
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Glad we didn't get a cheap one!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the swing set for about a year now. I'm very glad we didn't go with a cheaper/smaller one. It was a little oversized for our three year old when we got it but now she is on it almost every day. The ONE THING I will say is the slide want to flex quite a bit when the kids go down. I am hoping to figure out some sort of brace for it soon. Took me a few hours by myself to put together. its a pricy swing set but we dont regret it one bit. Very heavy duty and big enough to where the kids won't grow out of it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Pape

customer_reviews.title: Like having a park in your back yard!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, so much to do, easily shared between 3 kids. “It is the best swing set in the world” -7 year old
customer_reviews.author: mama3three

customer_reviews.title: Not a good as originally thought.
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love this set. But after only 2 1/2 yrs. The cross bar snapped off of the "A" frame . See photo. Tried calling CS but after waiting fir 20 min. I hung up! See photos attached.🙄
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of 13

customer_reviews.title: Price is worth the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the kids. Very sturdy, but must be anchored/tethered to achieve maximum sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect swingset for all ages. Took about 4 hours to build. Can be done with one person but may need 2 people when attaching the big pieces together for final assembly. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivey's

customer_reviews.title: Price is debatable but worth it for low maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: Had for over a year, heavy duty and awesome for kids of all ages. No rust or issues. Assembled myself, recommend an assistant and a small ladder or step stool to help. Just dont over torque bolts. Stainless hardware will snap under force, but a local hardware store can provide replacements if needed, had to replace 2 bolts and one nut before I learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Best Swingset EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing set we got our daughter for Christmas. My engineer husband kept saying "this is made really nice" as he was putting it together. I went together fast and easy - maybe took 3 hours. Everyday when I see this swing set in the yard, it makes me happy because it is soooo awesome!!! I kinda wish we'd got the swing set with the club house but our daughter is just a little to young for that now. Maybe in a couple years! LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: BuckSue

customer_reviews.title: Takes about 6 hours with 2 people to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it (ages 2 to 6) of course. However one of the pre-drilled metal plate did not line up with the holes drilled so the screws didn't work. Turned out okay because the other 3 hold it safely. However, may need to drill another hole in the metal to fasten the 4th screw.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the playset, was easy to put together, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love this play set! It wasn't too hard to put together, took about 3 hours for my dad and I to do. It seems very sturdy just sitting on top of the ground. Took 4 of us to move it once it was put together (so we could then re-level the ground underneath and prepare for sand). One of the nuts I received was missing threading, when I called the company they promptly sent me a replacement part at no charge. We've had the set up for about a month now and have had up to 5 kids on it at a time with no issues. Can't wait to get the matching dome climber!
customer_reviews.author: AZ IT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great play set
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were difficult to read. No parts are labeled except the bolts. Took some time to figure it out. The bolts are hard to thread because you can’t see what you’re doing. It took about 4 hours to assemble. Our son loves it and I think it will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing swing set
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery process. Didn't take too much work to put it together. EXCELLENT quality. I have zero complaints. Both my 6 year old daughter and almost 2 year old son enjoy it. I didn't want to spend the big price tag on a wooden one that wouldn't last nearly as long as this one will.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: solid, sturdy swing set, my son calls it his "park"! We live in a very high wind area and this swing set is going nowhere! We tie up the swings when the wind picks up,but are confident it will never blow over. I purchased the Flexible Flyer anchors but honestly we feel they're worthless and don't attach well. They are on but we're not counting on them and don't feel they're really necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kyseth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this playset. Put it together in approximately 5 hours with one adult and one teenager. It is exactly as described. All pieces were included in the various boxes. We probably should anchor it down better, but it just has minor wiggling.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: She can swing high and the set doesn't move!
customer_reviews.text: This swing set is so well made. Our granddaughter is 6 and she absolutely loves it. I have no regrets on spending the money on a set that she will be able to use for many years. My husband stripped a screw and Lifetime Products sent a replacement without a hassle. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: ... was sourced out to Old Dominion they weren't very nice to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was sourced out to Old Dominion they weren't very nice to deal with. We paid a company to install it. It's a nice looking set but it's not for big kids. My 7th grader is 125lbs and when he swings it shakes like a leaf.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases my husband and I have ever made for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases my husband and I have ever made for our kids. It's super well built and will last for years. My kids love it! My husband also uses it to do pull-ups. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: great and durable swing set, much better made than more expensive plastic or wooden models.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. My kids love it. heavy duty, and even when they grow out of it, I know I can sell it on Ebay for at least 1/2 if not 3/4 of what I paid for it. A great and durable swing set, much better made than more expensive plastic or wooden models.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Assembly was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this swing set in 2012 and have installed it in 2 homes...harsh midwest winters and summers have not impacred the finish one ioata. Both kids actively use it almost daily. Great product and couldn't have gone together more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Ragu

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: The set was delivered in toe large boxes and was very well organized. It was easy to put together and took about 3-4 hours. I was able to do most of it by myself with a little help from my wife. We got this set because of the use rating of up to a 12 year old. We have three kids and the oldest is almost 9. It is perfect for our three and they love it. It is very solidly made and even my wife and I can swing with the kids and it seems very stable and barely moves. We are extremely satisfied and would highly recommend this to other families with similar situations and needs.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilder

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It was a Christmas present and the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It was a Christmas present and the kids loved it. Was delivered on time and in good shape and took 2 adults 1.5 hrs to put together with no confusion. It's the middle of winter so it's not getting the use it will in the spring, but I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. So glad I purchased this swing set for my 5 year old son. It is so solid. My yard is a bit uneven and it doesn't matter - it is still super stable and does not need to be anchored. The colors make it blend right into the trees and grass, so it looks nice and doesn't stick out. I even love swinging on it!
customer_reviews.author: joellen77

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Being grandparents, we have encountered two generations of backyard swingsets. As a result, when the last one died we decided to look for one which was more durable that our previous sets. This one has very adequately met our expectations. Although pricier than a lot of others, the quality is worth the difference. The instructions are clear and there were no missing parts. Many steps require two people but the assembly process is not difficult. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Albert G Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Love this very sturdy swing set for our 9 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this very sturdy swing set for our 9 and 11 year olds. 5 kids, ages 8 and up were on it Thanksgiving Day and there was plenty to keep them occupied. Put it together in about 2.5 hours, all parts were included, delivery person was very accommodating. Would probably be overkill for younger kids, but that wasn't my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Liberkowski

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It lives up to the great reviews. Got it for the grandkids for Xmas. Daughter and son-in-law were very pleased with the assembly and structure and kids love it. Very solid and well made.
customer_reviews.author: MARTHA A BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly! Parts packed for each section you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly! Parts packed for each section you are working on. Sturdy enough adults under 250 lbs can swing. Grandkids 5 and 7 love it! Caught their Mommy hanging from the trapeze bar too! Would definitely buy again. Quick shipping. Actually arrived early. Color nice. Blends well with our landscape.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: We love the swing set not sure I would buy again from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic play set! We used the Amazon assembly service, and it took two men about two hours to complete the job. It can accommodate children of all ages and all at the same time!. We installed the swings in different heights and switched one for a toddler swing so everyone can have fun. It is very sturdy, like a playground play set (We anchored the A shape legs to the ground) . The slide is very high and fast and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy swingset
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and you can definitely feel how high quality the materials are. My only complaint is the slide not coming with holes drilled in it so I had to do some drilling on my own. I weigh 205 lbs and I can do pullups on this thing without it moving at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This swing set is built like a tank!
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 men three hours to put together. One set of holes didn't line up just right, but that was easily overcome. It is very solid and heavy duty. I bought it for my grandkids, ages 5-7. They call it their "playground"! I highly recommend it. The slide is even fun for the 7 year old - not a wimpy little slide at all. They love to climb all over it. Should keep them busy all summer!
customer_reviews.author: KY Woman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. Got this for victims of Hurricane Harvey. Kids lost their very first swing set. Raised money and Amazon delivered. Brought joy to these kids. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, compact, Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Well loved by all kids ages 3-10. Monkey bar isn’t too high (5 and 6 yos figured it out quickly), and the swings are sturdy for even adults. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it solo in a few hours. Sturdy, attractive, quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our swings
customer_reviews.text: It took us time to choose the right swing set. Delivery went very well. We had no problem putting together. We had 3 adults and it only took 4 hours. It is very sturdy. I weigh 200lbs and when I swing in it the structure stays firm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting some stair type stick on tread
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, heavy duty. It truly does self sustain & does not need to be anchored. We've had 3 , 10yr Olds & two 7 ya Olds on it at a time with no issues. I would recommend getting some stair type stick on tread, it's like sand paper and comes in strip or roll. We put it on the step rungs due to rainy days. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this swingset
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this swingset! My daughter is only 3, she may someday get too old to want to play on this oneday but she will never outgrow it! This thing is super sturdy, its as close to commercial grade as you can get. I love the powder coating. It did take my dad and I almost 6 hours to put together and there were a few bolts that gave us some grief while putting it all together but I am 100% extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome swingset! It's a great size for bigger kids ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome swingset! It's a great size for bigger kids (mine range from 11-6) and it's very sturdy. They love it, and it's not cheap or flimsy. It wasn't too terrible to put together either.
customer_reviews.author: D. Workman

product_meta.title: Lifetime Monkey Bar Adventure Swing Set with 9 Foot Wavy Slide
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
Safe fun swingset designed for kids of all ages; Includes 3 belt swings, 1 trapeze bar with gym rings, 9' wavy slide, fireman's pole, and monkey bars
Designed for safety; hard edges are rounded or covered with plastic caps and soft rubber grips on swing chains prevent pinching
Free-Standing - No Need for Cement & Easy to Maintain; No Staining or Painting Required
Constructed of all-weather high strength low alloy steel; will not crack, chip, fade, wrot, warp, or peel like wood playsets
Total area of unit: 13.8' W x 18.6' D; Backed by a 5-year limited manufacturer warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
